LineComment.Text: Check the cycle length and generate alarm if it takes too much time
Wait for rising edge on iStart_Cycle
If Vessel is deactivated go to end (Vessel SetWeight = 0)
If last cycle feeded to much alloy addition, skip this cycle
Wait until calculated weight is reached
Shut off Motor when calculated weight on scale is reached
Reset Timer for stable scale measurement
Wait for stabilize timer until scale measurement is stable
Calculate the difference between real weight and calculated weight
